short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A live-checker for checking the compliancy of your data on eScriptorium with SegmOnto vocabularies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to run various checks on the segmentation you produced on an eScriptorium instance.
